channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024021074
item.description:
Report X-2024021074

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-09
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A NEXT DAY AIR UPS EXPRESS BOX THAT WAS LEAKING. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO 15.5 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF FLAMMABLE CLEAN UP CHAIN CLEANER THAT WERE SLIGHTLY LEAKING FROM THEIR NOZZLES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024021058
item.description:
Report X-2024021058

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-06
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE LEAKING CLASS 8 HAZMAT WAS FOUND BY RESPONDER AT THE SD1 HIGH VOLUME PICKOFF AND WAS RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. THE CONTENTS OF THE PACKAGE, "SUBARU 12V BATTERY (UN2794 BATTERIES, WET, FILLED WITH ACID)," HAD SPILLED SULFURIC ACID. THE PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024021234
item.description:
Report X-2024021234

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-08
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking, removed from sortation, and brought to QA. DescribePack: Both bottles had loose caps and were leaking from broken seals. Potential hazardous label covered by shipping label. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a lined spill bin and brought to appropriate damage processing area.

item.title: Report X-2024020861
item.description:
Report X-2024020861

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-22T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-29
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was brought to QA post spill. Box was soiled. Inside were 12 bottles of cleaning solution. One had a loose cap and was missing about half of it's liquid. DescribePack: Twist plastic cap was loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: tightened cap
